name: Games Of Glory - Guardians Pack
description:
All the strength of the Synarch's finest guard will be at your fingertips thanks to the mighty Guardians pack. This pack is an excellent starter, unlocking one Clone from each of the 5 Games of Glory classes. The Universe's finest warriors will be sure to lead you to victory!

As an added bonus, we are throwing in 1000 Soldi, enough (to purchase a full skin?). This pack is 29Euros worth of content for the meager price of 9.99!

This pack contains:

- Byorn the "Battle medic" (Support)

- Ragnar "Frost Prince" (Tank)

- Thror "Energy Specialist" (Carry)

- Saga "Biomech Vanguard" (Scout)

- Grendel "Unchained beast" (Assassin)

- 1000 Soldi, virtual currency for ingame purchases
